Class Entity

java.lang.Object
entity.base.Entity
All Implemented Interfaces:
Renderable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bullet, Door, DroppedItem, Enemy, Player
public abstract class Entity extends Object implements Renderable
Entity Represents an entity in the game
